begin_experiment.tank_type: The type of tank selected for the experiment

begin_dive.site_id: ID for the site the player is diving to

ask_for_help.node_id: ID for the node displayed when asking for help

talk_with_guide.node_id: ID for the node displayed when clicking the guide button

script_triggered.node_id: ID for the node displayed when guide script is triggered

jobCompletionTime.description: Time taken to complete a given job

syncCompletionTime.description: Time taken to achieve 100% sync in a simulation

sessionDuration.description: Time spent playing in a given session

sessionGuideCount.description: Number of times player talked with the guide throughout the session

sessionHelpCount.description: Number of times player clicked the help button throughout the session

sessionID.description: The player's session ID number for this play session

sessionJobsCompleted.description: Number of jobs completed in a given session

db_columns.event_params: A repeated record of the parameters associated with this event
db_columns.user_id: The user ID set via the setUserId API
db_columns.geo: A record of the user's geographic information
db_columns.platform: The platform on which the app was built
db_columns.session_id: ID for the current play session
db_columns.timestamp: Datetime when the event was logged
